top_risks.title: Top Risks for Your City
top_risks.description: These are the climate hazards that pose the greatest threat to your city. They're calculated by combining hazard likelihood, exposure, and vulnerability scores.
top_risks.insights: Focus on risks marked 'High' or 'Very High' as they require immediate attention. Consider both the overall risk score and individual components when planning responses.

hazard_comparison.title: Hazard Comparison
hazard_comparison.description: This chart shows how different aspects of risk contribute to your city's overall risk score for each climate threat.
hazard_comparison.insights: Look for patterns in what drives your risks - is it high hazard likelihood, exposure, or vulnerability? This helps target your adaptation strategies effectively.

sector_distribution.title: Sector Distribution
sector_distribution.description: This visualization shows how climate risks are distributed across different sectors of your city.
sector_distribution.insights: Identify which sectors face multiple high risks - these may need cross-cutting adaptation strategies.

projections.title: Climate Projections
projections.description: Visualize how climate hazards may change in the future
projections.insights: This section shows projections for key climate indicators under different scenarios.
projections.no_data: No climate projection data available for this city
projections.no_indices: No climate indices available for this city
projections.select_scenario: Please select at least one scenario to view
projections.no_data_available_try_another: Climate data is not available for this city. Try selecting another city.

modal.title: Climate Index Details
modal.data_explanation: These projections are based on climate models and show potential changes compared to the historical baseline period (1980-2005).
modal.rcp45_explanation: Assumes emissions peak around 2040 and then decline, with moderate mitigation efforts.
modal.rcp85_explanation: Assumes continued high emissions through the century with limited mitigation efforts.

ccra_table.title: Complete Risk Assessment Table
ccra_table.description: Detailed breakdown of risk assessment data showing all analyzed hazards and their components.
ccra_table.insights: Compare risk scores and components across different hazards. Pay special attention to the relationship between hazard, exposure, and vulnerability scores to understand what drives each risk level.
ccra_table.description_with_assessment: Detailed breakdown of risk assessment data showing all analyzed hazards and their components. Values have been adjusted based on Qualitative Assessment results.

qualitative_assessment.title: Get better insights.
qualitative_assessment.subtitle: Answer a few questions.
qualitative_assessment.description: Take the Qualitative Assessment Questionnaire to weigh-in other non-numerical factors in our calculations and get more tailored scorings after just 5 questions.

export.title: Access your data in one click
export.description: Export this visualization in the format that best suits your needs
